text: Tadeusz Borowski (9 July 1941 - 4 March 2022) was a Polish actor. He was born in Warsaw, Poland. His career began in 1963. He was known for playing Eugeniusz Trushinsky in Remember Your Name (1974), Marian Rejewski in Sekret Enigmy (1979) and as Dr. Sanchez in Chopin: Desire for Love (2002). Borowski died of natural causes in Warsaw on 4 March 2022, aged 80.Å»egnamy Tadeusza Borowskiego ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Polish movie actors Category:Polish television actors Category:Polish stage actors Category:Polish voice actors Category:Actors from Warsaw
title: Tadeusz Borowski (actor)
